name: Gnome Out
description:
It's a race to the top of the mountain
filled with shortcuts and pit falls
in this twisted version of Snakes and Ladders a Jame Game #6 Submission

How to Play
Press 'Spacebar' to roll a random move amount. Your character will move said spaces.
Shortcut: Landing on a Green Arrow allows your player to take the short cut.
Pit Fall: These open pits marked with a Red Arrow set you back.
First character to the Mushroom House wins the race.

Credits
Artist - cafeDraw
Programmer - Sagerus

Additional Credits
Menu Music Fantastical by Runar Blesvik [via Artlist]
Music Artful Thief  by Kadir Demir [via Artlist]
GUI Kit "DarkStone" by Layer Lab [via Unity Asset Store]
Fantasy Menu SFX by Chris M Audio [via Unity Asset Store]
